title: Dire Raven
desc:
Post 1573
- Does 1d4 + 1d2 Piercing Damage to a random player excluding yourself. The total of dice rolled is how many cards they draw.
- Alternatively, if you choose, can do 1d4 damage, and the player that gets attacked is **Rended.** **Rended** player draws 1d4 cards the next time a <:black:1106265022453268530> or <:red:1106234051129507932> card is played, then loses the status.
